source.2fba7efa:
plt.figure(figsize=(18,8))
ax = sns.countplot(survey_data['Q5'], order = survey_data['Q5'].value_counts().iloc[:15].index)
ax.set(title = 'Current Role', xlabel = '', ylabel = '')
for item in ax.get_xticklabels():
    item.set_rotation(90)
plt.show()

fig.show()

**Analytics Competition**

2021 Kaggle Machine Learning & Data Science Survey
The most comprehensive dataset available on the state of ML and data science

Competition Steps:

* Import the required Python libraries
* Load and explore data (Exploration Data) (EDA)
* Cleaning Data / Null Values
* Data analysis, Visualization and histograms
